mapper.sql: t.id as "id", t.userID as "userID", t.name as "name", t.address as "address", t.longitude as "longitude", t.latitude as "latitude", date_format(t.addTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "addTime", t.codeNumber as "codeNumber", t.light as "light", t.charge as "charge", t.checked as "checked", t.remark as "remark", t.cameraIP as "cameraIP", t.cameraSequence as "cameraSequence", t.cameraVerificationCode as "cameraVerificationCode", t.accessToken as "accessToken"
mapper.select:
select
from advertisement_machine t order by t.addTime, convert(t.name using gbk) asc
mapper.insert: insert into advertisement_machine ( id, userID, name, address, longitude, latitude, addTime, codeNumber, light, charge, checked, remark, cameraIP, cameraSequence, cameraVerificationCode ) values ( id, #{userID}, #{name}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{addTime}, #{codeNumber}, 0, 0, 0, #{remark}, #{cameraIP}, #{cameraSequence}, #{cameraVerificationCode} );
mapper.update: update advertisement_machine set userID = #{userID}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, remark = #{remark}, cameraIP = #{cameraIP}, cameraSequence = #{cameraSequence}, cameraVerificationCode = #{cameraVerificationCode} where id = #{id}
